question.title: Seems to me that in the Hyperledger Fabric test-network, only chaincode that created the asset has access to it
question.body:
I was using Fabric Java chaincodes and CLI to work with the creation of assets by different chaincodes in the same channel, and it seems to me that only the chaincode that defined that particular asset can implement getStringState/putStringState in its logic for that asset, so it works. Other chaincodes return nothing. it is network https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-samples/tree/main/test-network that I am using.

I am also interested how to put restrictions in networks where there is not this kind of restriction,
